fw.name: ProductStructure
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATPrdCommonFileSelection
class.abstract: Base class to give basic implementation for CATIProductFileSelection.

method.name: ExtractProducts
method.abstract: Extracts products representing the selected files.

method.name: GetSelectionCount
method.abstract: Default implementation assumes that each selected file is able to generate exactly one product.

class.name: CATPrsWorkModeServices
class.abstract: Class to retrieve and assign a work mode of/on a Product.

method.name: GetWorkMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the work mode of the Product.

method.name: SetWorkMode
method.abstract: Defines the work mode of the Product.

class.name: CATIAsmNavigateStruct
class.abstract: Interface to allow new navigation behaviour on one implementation that already binds to CATINavigateObject.

class.name: CATIBlockMovable
class.abstract: Interface to make and assembly soft or rigid.

method.name: IsSoft
method.abstract: Tests whether the assembly is soft.

method.name: MakeRigidAssembly
method.abstract: Makes the product rigid and all its children until they are rigid.

method.name: MakeSoftAssembly
method.abstract: Makes the assembly all its hierarchy flexible.

class.name: CATICtxMenuProvider
class.abstract: Interface used to retrieve the contextual menu defined for an extended object.

method.name: GetContextualMenu
method.abstract: Returns the contextual menu defined for the extended object.

class.name: CATICustomName
class.abstract: Interface used as a client-specific user exit to customize PartNumber.

method.name: ComputePartNumber
method.abstract: Computes the part number and file extension from the current path.

class.name: CATIMovable
class.abstract: Interface to manage the movable object.

method.name: ApplyTransformation
method.abstract: Applies a transformation in coordinate space of the context.

method.name: GetAbsPosition
method.abstract: Retrieves position in global context.

method.name: GetPosition
method.abstract: Retrieves position in given context.

method.name: SetAbsPosition
method.abstract: Sets position in absolute 3D-coordinate space (global context).

method.name: SetPosition
method.abstract: Sets the relative position in given context.

class.name: CATIPrdObjectPublisher
class.abstract: Interface to create and manage publications on a Product.

method.name: GetDirectObject
method.abstract: Retrieves the direct publication object.

method.name: GetFinalObject
method.abstract: Retrieves the final publication object.

method.name: IsFinallyPublished
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of the publication objects referencing a given publication object.

method.name: IsFinallyPublished
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of the publication objects referencing a given publication object.

method.name: IsPublished
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of an object's publications.

method.name: IsPublished
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of an object's publications.

method.name: ListPublications
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of the publications of the current product.

method.name: Publish
method.abstract: Creates a new publication.

method.name: Unpublish
method.abstract: Deletes an existing publication.

method.name: Unvaluate
method.abstract: Deletes a publication's valuation.

method.name: Valuate
method.abstract: Valuates a publication directly with the object being published.

method.name: Valuate
method.abstract: Valuates a publication with another publication object.

method.name: GetDefinition
method.abstract: Retrieves the product reference's definition.

method.name: GetDescriptionInst
method.abstract: Retrieves the product instance's description.

method.name: GetDescriptionRef
method.abstract: Retrieves the product reference's description.

method.name: GetNomenclature
method.abstract: Retrieves the product reference's nomenclature.

method.name: GetRevision
method.abstract: Retrieves the product reference's revision.

method.name: GetSource
method.abstract: Retrieves the product reference's source.

method.name: AddConnector
method.abstract: Adds connector by agregating it to the product.

method.name: AddProduct
method.abstract: Adds subproduct.

method.name: AddProduct
method.abstract: Creates new product and adds it as subproduct.

method.name: AddProducts
method.abstract: Adds subproducts.

method.name: AddShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Adds a representation to the product with a specific behavior.

method.name: AddShapeRepresentation
method.abstract: Adds a representation to the product with a specific behavior.

method.name: FindInstance
method.abstract: Returns the instance of this in context.

method.name: GetAllChildren
method.abstract: Returns list of all subproducts.

method.name: GetChildren
method.abstract: Returns list of subproducts directly concerned.

method.name: GetChildrenCount
method.abstract: Returns number of direct subproducts.

method.name: GetConnector
method.abstract: Returns connector.

method.name: GetFatherProduct
method.abstract: Returns the owning product.

method.name: GetPartNumber
method.abstract: Returns the name of a product reference.

method.name: GetPrdInstanceName
method.abstract: Returns the name of a product instance.

method.name: GetReferenceProduct
method.abstract: Returns the reference product.

method.name: GetShapeRep
method.abstract: Retrieves the product's representation by its name.

method.name: IsAssociatedToShape
method.abstract: Returns whether the product has a representation of the given name with a given behavior.

method.name: IsReference
method.abstract: Determine whether a product is a reference or not.

method.name: ListShapeRep
method.abstract: Lists the product's representations.

method.name: RemoveProduct
method.abstract: Removes an instance of product.

method.name: RemoveShapeRep
method.abstract: Removes a specific representation from the product.

method.name: SetPartNumber
method.abstract: Sets the name on a product reference.

method.name: SetPrdInstanceName
method.abstract: Sets a name on a product instance.

class.name: CATIProductFileSelection
class.abstract: Interface to define allowed kinds of files to be imported in a product.

class.name: CATIProductInSession
class.abstract: Interface used to manipulate temporary data about a product.

method.name: GetActiveShapeName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the active representation.

method.name: GetActiveShapeRep
method.abstract: Returns the active representation.

method.name: GetActiveShapeRep
method.abstract: Returns the active representation.

method.name: SetActiveShapeRep
method.abstract: Activates a representation by its name.

class.name: CATIProductSelection
class.abstract: Interface allowing to extract products (features) from a selection.

method.name: ExtractProducts
method.abstract: Extracts products corresponding to the selection.

method.name: GetSelectionCount
method.abstract: Count of selected objects.
